channel.title: Yell command
channel.description:
How would I implement a certain total level to yell? Like say you need 100 total level to yell
Source: PI

item.title: Yell command
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Make a void in like PlayerAssistant.java that adds up all of the skills to create a total level void. Use that void to determine what total level you need to have to yell. For example:

public short getTotalLevel() { int totalLevel; totalLevel = (getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) return (short)totalLevel; }

And add this to your yell command:

if (c.getPA().getTotalLevel() > 99) { c2.sendMessage("[Player]"+ Misc.capitalize(c.displayName) +": " + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +""); } else { c.sendMessage("You need a total level of at least 100 to yell."); return; }

Read full topic
